div:
List of Examples
This page contains a list with the name and a short description of some examples for each profile. For a full list of examples please refer to the artifact index.
Examples for AuditEvent - IEHR AuditEvent Example
This example shows the use of the AuditEvent-IEHR profile to represent an AuditEvent.
Examples for BioSignal - IEHR BioSignal Example - Blood Test
This example shows the use of the BioSignal-IEHR profile to describe a blood test .
BioSignal Example - Echocardiogram
This example shows the use of the BioSignal-IEHR profile to describe an Echocardiogram.
BioSignal Example - EKG
This example shows the use of the BioSignal-IEHR profile to describe an EKG .
BioSignal Example - HolterMonitoring
This example shows the use of the BioSignal-IEHR profile to describe a HolterMonitoring.
Examples for Condition - IEHR
Condition-IEHR Example - FTGM
This example is based on raw data provided by FTGM and describes the use of the Condition-IEHRprofile to describe an Hypertension Condition.
Examples for DiagnosticConclusion - IEHR
DiagnosticConclusion Example - FTGM
This example shows the use of the Condition DiagnosticConclusion - IEHR profile to describe unstructured conclusions as text.
Examples for DiagnosticReport BioSignalReport - IEHR
BioSignalReport Example - Echocardiogramm
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReport BioSignalReport - IEHR profile to describe a diagnosis resulting from an Echocardiogram observation.
The Echocardiogram is referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as the content of a Media resource.
BioSignalReport-IEHR Example - EKG / BioSignalReport-IEHR Example - EKG (Bundle)
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReport BioSignalReport-IEHR to represent a Report based upon a radiology image.
The image is referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as the content of a Media resource.
Examples for DiagnosticReport ImagingReport-IEHR ImagingReport-IEHR Example - SingleImage
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReport ImagingReport-IEHR to represent a Report based upon a radiology image.
The image is referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as the content of a Media resource.
ImagingReport-IEHR Example - ImagingStudy
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReport ImagingReport-IEHR to represent a Report based upon an imaging study.
The imaging study is referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as an ImagingStudy resource
ImagingReport-IEHR Example - X-Ray - Bundle
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReport ImagingReport-IEHR to represent a diagnosis based on an X-Ray.
The X-Ray image is referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as a Media resource.
Examples for DiagnosticReportLaboratoryResult - IEHR
LaboratoryReport Example - 1
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReportLaboratoryResult to represent a Report based upon three observations.
The observations are referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as Observation resources.
LaboratoryReport Example - 3
This example shows the use of the DiagnosticReportImaging to represent a Report based upon bio-humoral values.
The observations are referenced in the report and added to the Bundle as Observation resources.
Examples for DiagnosticReportVitalSignReport - IEHR
Examples for DiagnosticConclusion - IEHR DiagnosticConclusion-IEHR Example
...
Examples for DocumentManifest-IEHR
DocumentManifest Example - multiple Bundle
This example shows the use of the DocumentManifest to reference multiple documents.
The bundle contains a DocumentManifest and muliple DocumentReferences with each referencing one document. The DocumentReferences also contain additional informations about the author of the document.
Examples for DocumentReference - IEHR
DocumentReference Example - MedicalDocument 1
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
The document is referenced in the content attribute of the DocumentReference.
DocumentReference Example - MedicalDocument 2
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
The document is referenced in the content attribute of the DocumentReference and the example contains additional informations about the author of the document.
DocumentReference Example - Cardiology Consult Note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Heart Disease Action Plan
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Legal Document
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Cardiology Consult Note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Cardiology Interventional Procedure Note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Cardiology Hospital Admission history and physical note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Patient's Home Education Note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
DocumentReference Example - Deprecated Plan of Care Note
This example shows the use of the DocumentReference to reference a single document.
Examples for Encounter - IEHR Encounter Example - Routine Encounter-PTH
This example shows the use of the Encounter resource to document a routine encounter.
It contains informations about the priority, class, duration and participants of the encounter.
Encounter Example - Emergency Encounter Heart Failure
This example shows the use of the Encounter resource to document an emergency encounter.
It contains informations about the priority, class, duration and participants of the encounter.
Examples for HospitalDischargeReport - IEHR HospitalDischargeReport Example
This example shows the use of the Composition resource to display a HospitalDischargeReport.
Examples for Immunization - IEHR Immunization Example - Influenza
This example shows the use of the Immunization-IEHR resource to display an Influenza immunization.
Examples for MedicationRequest-Prescription - IEHR
MedicationRequest Example - Pantoprazole
This example shows the use of the MedicationRequest resource to display a Pantoprazole prescription.
MedicationRequest Example - Paroxetina
This example shows the use of the MedicationRequest resource to display a Paroxetina prescription..
MedicationRequest Example - Furosemide
This example shows the use of the MedicationRequest resource to display a Furosemide prescription..
Examples for Extended Translation - IEHR
ExtendedTranslation Example - Practitioner
This example shows the use of the ExtendedTranslation extension to provide additional informations about a translation.
It provides additional informations about a translation performed by a Practitioner.
ExtendedTranslation Example - Device
This example shows the use of the ExtendedTranslation extension to provide additional informations about a translation.
It provides additional informations about a translation performed by a Device.
ExtendedTranslation Example - multiple ExtendedTranslation with Device
This example shows the use of the ExtendedTranslation extension to provide additional informations about multiple translation.
It provides additional informations about three translation performed by the same Device.
Examples for Provenance - IEHR Provenance Example - DocumentReference - Addendum Document
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an DocumentReference-IEHR referencing a PDF document as an attachment.
Provenance Example - BioSignalReport - EKG
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an BioSignalReport-IEHR using the example of an EKG.
Provenance Example - DocumentReference - Attachment
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an DocumentReference-IEHR referencing a PDF document as an attachment.
Provenance Example - BioSignalReport - Echocardiogram
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an BioSignalReport-IEHR using the example of an Echocardiogram.
Provenance Example - BioSignalReport - HolterMonitoring
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an BioSignalReport-IEHR using the example of an Holter Monitoring.
Provenance Example - ImagingReport - ImagingStudy
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an ImagingReport-IEHR containing an ImagingStudy.
Provenance Example - ImagingReport - X-Ray
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an ImagingReport-IEHR using the example of an X-Ray that is included as a Media resource.
Provenance Example - LaboratoryReport - Blood Test
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an LaboratoryReport-IEHR using the example of a Blood Test.
Provenance Example - VitalSignReport
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an VitalSignReport-IEHR documenting different types of vital signs.
Provenance Example - DocumentReference - MedicalDocument 1
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an DocumentReference-IEHR referencing a PDF document as an attachment.
Provenance Example - Composition - Past Visits
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of a Composition resource using the example of past visits.
Provenance Example - Composition MedicalVisitReport
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of a Composition resource using the example of a medical visit report.
Provenance Example - HospitalDischargeReport
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of an HospitalDischargeReport-IEHR.
Provenance Example - Composition EncounterList
This example shows the usage of the Provenance-IEHR profile to represent the Provenance of a Composition resource using the example of list of Encounters.
Provenance Example - Condition - Hypertension Provenance Example - DocumentManifest Provenance Example - TreatmentPlan - FTGM Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - Furosemide Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - Bisoprolol Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - Fondaparinux Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - Pantoprazole Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - Paroxetina Provenance Example - TreatmentPlan Provenance Example - Composition MedicalVisitReport Provenance Example - MedicationRequest - FTGM
Examples for TreatmentPlan - IEHR TreatmentPlan-IEHR Example - minimal
...
TreatmentPlan-IEHR Example - FTGM
...
Other examples
Patient Example
This example shows the use of the Patient resource to describe the subject of a document.
The patient described in this example is used for all examples in this IG.
Organization Example
This example shows the use of the Organization resource.
The organization described in this example is used for all examples in this IG.
Practitioner Example
This example shows the use of the Practitioner resource.
The practitioner described in this example is used for all examples in this IG.
VitalSign Example
This example shows the use of the VitalSign profile to describe the observation of vital signs
It contains two observations and informations about the patient and the practitioner in a Bundle.
ObservationBundle Example - HolterMonitoring
This example shows the use of multiple Observations to represent a HolterMonitoring.
The different measurements of the HolterMonitoring are captured in Observations and the Bundle contains these Observations.
